Description: This is/was a brand new EVH Striped Series VH I Strat from Fender, in original box. This is NOT like all the others!Check out the sound-clip below before you go! I aged/relic'ed this Fender EVH to look like the photos of Eddie's original first version black and white Frankenstein. I've even fashioned a strap like Eddie made for himself. I took a 3-row studded leather belt and made the necessary modifications with the chain and the chrome clips and eye-hooks... just like Eddie. I considered removing the "EVH" logo on the peghead, and replacing it with a Gibson decal, but decided not to go that far. I got a blank 3-ply guard and made the hole for the pickup to look hand-cut and off-center a bit, like his. I also added the extra hole for the tone knob and the volume knob is further away than they are usually set... just like Eddie's. The aging, the modifications, the strap all make this one unique. It turned-out GREAT! This one is unique among all the others! I added the photo from the Japanese magazine that I used and an old photo of Eddie circa 1978.All of the original parts are included and in the factory plastic pouch. It will ship in the original factory box shown!There is an audio clip attached that I played this guitar with a backing track from VH I, Jamie's Cryin'The original specs are:The EVH Striped Series guitar features a basswood Stratocaster-style body decked out in Eddie Van Halen’s famed striped graphics in white with black stripes. The guitar also has a graphite-reinforced quartersawn maple neck with a hand-rubbed oil finish and thumbwheel truss rod adjustment, compound-radius maple fingerboard (12”-16”) with 22 jumbo frets and black dot inlays, and a single ferocious direct-mount Wolfgang humbucking pickup. Other premium features include a single white volume control knob (labeled “tone”), single-ply black pickguard (white with black stripes model only), bar string retainer and Floyd Rose® locking nut, EVH-branded Floyd Rose® locking tremolo with EVH D-Tuna®, EVH die-cast tuners, chrome hardware, vintage-style strap buttons and EVH neck plate.SpecsBody Material: Basswood Body Finish: Gloss Urethane Neck Material: 1-Piece Bolt-On Quartersawn Maple with Graphite Reinforcement and Scarf Joint Neck Shape: Wolfgang Backshape Scale Length: 25.5" (648 mm) Fingerboard Radius: 12" - 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm) Number of Frets: 22 Fret Size: Jumbo String Nut: Floyd Rose® Locking Nut Width: 1.6875" (42.86 mm) Headstock: Standard Stratocaster® Neck Plate: EVH®-Branded Neck Finish: Hand-Rubbed Urethane Gel Fingerboard: Maple Position Inlays: Dot Bridge Pickup: Direct Mount Wolfgang® Humbucking Controls: Master Volume Bridge: EVH®-Branded Floyd Rose® Locking Tremolo with EVH D-Tuna® Tuning Machines: EVH®-Branded
Title: Fender EVH Striped Strat Black & White Relic w/Custom Van Halen Stud Belt Strap
